short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and categorize code snippets from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and categorize code snippets from any webpage with just a click! The Code Snippet Saver extension allows you to highlight any code, right-click, and select “Save Code Snippet” to store it securely. Organize your snippets by language and topic for quick access later. Perfect for developers, students, or anyone who frequently works with code, this tool simplifies your workflow and keeps your favorite snippets at your fingertips. Install now to enhance your coding experience and never lose a great piece of code again!
